meanings.definition: A painted or carved panel or panels situated above and behind an altar.
meanings.sent1: The church displayed beautiful altarpieces behind the altar.
meanings.sent2: The altarpieces in the cathedral depicted scenes from the Bible.
meanings.sent3: During the service, the priest accidentally knocked over one of the altarpieces.
meanings.sent4: The altarpieces seemed to glow with divine light, captivating the worshippers.
meanings.sent5: Visitors to the church were mesmerized by the intricate details of the altarpieces.

meanings.definition: A work of art, especially a painting, on a religious subject, displayed above and behind an altar.
meanings.sent1: The museum had a collection of ancient altarpieces on display.
meanings.sent2: The altarpieces in the chapel were created by a famous artist.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to touch the altarpieces during the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The altarpieces cast a solemn atmosphere over the sacred space.
meanings.sent5: The altarpieces depicted saints and angels in vivid colors, bringing the scenes to life.
